Articles.Content: I'd like to be able to drop a node and then focus my camera on that node. If the node vanishes (like if I close the node out) then the focus should (probably) just pop back to the thing it had been focused on before... Or, perhaps the camera can stay where it is so one could more easily place a new node in that area, and there be a button to return focus to your vessel.

You can actually do this already. Press the tab key after placing your node and you should focus on it.

This works for cycling your focus through the planets as well. Shift+tab cycles backwards in the queue, and backspace returns you to your ship.

(make sure you're in map mode first, obviously, otherwise you're going to trigger your abort sequence!)
Indeed, this is already possible. Closing now.
